skill.s1.name: Electric Bomb
skill.s1.description: Deal [color=#fcff37][b]Electric damage[/b][/color] to 1 foe equal to [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of [color=#fcff37][b]Attack[/b][/color].
If the foe is not [color=#fcff37][i][b]Shocked[/b][/i][/color], there is a [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] chance to inflict [color=#fcff37][i][b]Shock[/b][/i][/color] for 2 turns.
If the foe is already [color=#fcff37][i][b]Shocked[/b][/i][/color], increase damage by [color=#fcff37][b]30%[/b][/color].
skill.s2.name: Meta Dynamite
skill.s2.description: Deal [color=#fcff37][b]Electric damage[/b][/color] to all foes equal to [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of [color=#fcff37][b]Attack[/b][/color].
Increase damage to the main target by [color=#fcff37][b]25%[/b][/color].
skill.s3.name: Sparky Surprise
skill.s3.description: Grant [color=#a3b8fc][b]Player 2[/b][/color] to 1 ally for 2 turns, and increase Yui's [color=#a3b8fc][b]Attack[/b][/color] by {skill_data}.

For 2 turns, when an ally with [color=#a3b8fc][b]Player 2[/b][/color] deals damage to a foe with a skill, perform a follow-up attack, dealing [color=#fcff37][b]Electric damage[/b][/color] equal to [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of [color=#fcff37][b]Attack[/b][/color] (max 2 times).
Increase chance to activate [ref=a0][color=#c3e342][b][u]Jolly Cooperation[/u][/b][/color][/ref] by [color=#fcff37][b]10%[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
skill.hl.name: Highlight
skill.hl.description: Increase [color=#fcff37][b]Attack[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] and [color=#fcff37][b]follow-up damage[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of [color=#fcff37][b]Attack[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
Activate follow-up when allies deal damage to foes with skills for 2 turns.
skill.p1.name: Virtual Landowner
skill.p1.description: Increase follow-up damage to [color=#fcff37][i][b]Shocked[/b][/i][/color] foes by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
skill.p2.name: Let's Go Together
skill.p2.description: When an ally has [color=#a3b8fc][b]Player 2[/b][/color], increase that ally and Yui's [color=#fcff37][b]critical rate[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] and [color=#fcff37][b]Attack[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
awareness.a0.name: Jolly Cooperation
awareness.a0.description: When an ally deals damage with a skill, there is a [color=#fcff37][b]35%[/b][/color] chance to activate Resonance, dealing [color=#fcff37][b]Electric damage[/b][/color] equal to [color=#fcff37][b]80%[/b][/color] of [color=#fcff37][b]Attack[/b][/color] as a follow-up attack.
After a follow-up, increase target's next [color=#fcff37][b]Electric damage[/b][/color] taken by [color=#fcff37][b]15%[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
awareness.a1.name: Payappa
awareness.a1.description: Increase [color=#fcff37][b]critical rate[/b][/color] of follow-up attacks by [color=#fcff37][b]20%[/b][/color].
Increase [color=#fcff37][b]critical rate[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]10%[/b][/color] after landing a follow-up attack on [color=#fcff37][i][b]Shocked[/b][/i][/color] foes.
awareness.a2.name: Rainbow Maker
awareness.a2.description: Increase the skill levels of [ref=s3][color=#c3e342][b][u]Sparky Surprise[/u][/b][/color][/ref] and [ref=hl][color=#c3e342][b][u]Thief Tactics[/u][/b][/color][/ref] by 3.
awareness.a3.name: Welcome Rain
awareness.a3.description: After performing a follow-up attack on a foe, increase [color=#fcff37][b]Attack[/b][/color] of Yui and allies with [color=#a3b8fc][b]Player 2[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]10%[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
awareness.a4.name: Flower Garden
awareness.a4.description: Increase the skill levels of [ref=s1][color=#c3e342][b][u]Electric Bomb[/u][/b][/color][/ref] and [ref=s2][color=#c3e342][b][u]Meta Dynamite[/u][/b][/color][/ref] by 3.
awareness.a5.name: Virtual Fertilizer
awareness.a5.description: [b][ref=hl][color=#c3e342][u]Highlight[/u][/color][/ref] Enhanced[/b]: Increase [color=#fcff37][b]critical damage[/b][/color] of follow-up attacks by [color=#fcff37][b]40%[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
awareness.a6.name: Humongously Huge Harvest
awareness.a6.description: If only 1 foe is present, increase Yui's follow-up attack by [color=#fcff37][b]110%[/b][/color] of [color=#fcff37][b]Attack[/b][/color].
Follow-up attack deals damage equal to [color=#fcff37][b]25%[/b][/color] of [color=#fcff37][b]Attack[/b][/color] to all other foes.
